story:
This is our continued Campaign to raise the funds for Missoula's first Pakistani food truck. The original campaign raised $10,000, which would all be used towards the purchase of the food truck. Any additional funds raised through this second attempt, would be added to the original amount. As most food trailers start from about $25,000, we hope to raise enough funds to at least acquire the most important and expensive equipment to start operation. 

We have also been in contact with local media outlets, and we hope the exposure from that would help spread the word and get the community to chip in to help bring this dream to fruition.

Introduction

Hello, my name is Zohair Bajwa. I was born and raised in Lahore, Pakistan, and have been in Missoula since 2006. My friends and family will all tell you how much I enjoy sharing my culture through food – sharing the distinct tastes and smells of home with the people I love. Because of this, I have decided to embark on a new, exciting, and delicious endeavor – bringing the tastes of authentic Pakistani food to the Missoula community.

 

I hope to bring Lahore’s authentic street food to the streets of Missoula and the surrounding area. My wife Megan and I are looking into securing a food trailer in which to prepare and serve up some delicious Pakistani food to tantalize your taste buds and keep you coming back for more. This is where your support and generosity comes in, and please allow me to thank you up front.

 

Community and Food

 

Ever since I came to Missoula in 2006 as a student at the University of Montana, there has always been something missing for me – good curries, and, more specifically, Pakistani food.

 

I was deeply honored to have the chance to cook for my community through the United We Eat (“UWE”) program through Soft Landing Missoula last year. It was such a humbling experience – to see the excitement the Missoula community displayed for authentic Pakistani food. We ended up selling out 150 meals!

https://bit.ly/2YY7Y25

https://bit.ly/2IrA0xs

I plan to bring the same love and passion to my food trailer as I did for the UWE program, and you can expect no compromises when it comes to using authentic spices and recipes, resulting in a whole new world of flavors for you to enjoy.

 

Eventually, once we are up and running and have firm footing in the Missoula food scene, we plan to give back to our Missoula neighbors, either by specials or discounted/free meals for various ones in the community.

 

What Foods to Expect

 

Megan and I have had several conversations about a menu we believe would best bring the tastes of Lahore to the people of Missoula. During our trip home earlier this year, we explored different flavors that we think would work best to introduce to our community here. We will initially be serving:

 

Chicken Karahi: traditionally cooked in a wok with tomatoes and spices, simmered to a thick sauce. Served best with naan and kachumar* (keto-friendly)

Daal: orange lentils perfectly cooked to a stew-like consistency. Prepared with spices and served best over rice or naan (vegan, vegetarian friendly)

Samosa: everyone knows about these delicious, fried concoctions!

Paratha Rolls: a traditional grab-and-go street food from Pakistan. Chicken or vegetables cooked in spices, mixed with kachumar*, mint and tamarind chutneys, wrapped in a crispy paratha (fry bread).

Shakar Qandi: My wife’s favorite snack in Lahore! Sweet potato mixed with freshly squeezed orange and spices. Traditionally served over newspaper (we won’t be doing that here, obviously – hello health code violation), and toothpicks.

*Kachumar: sliced raw onions, raw tomatoes mixed with fresh lemon/lime juice, cilantro, salt and black pepper. A perfect accompaniment to any of the above-listed meals.

Chutneys: Spicy mint chutney and a sweet and tangy tamarind chutney.

 

What You Get for Helping Fund This Project

 

Besides having a local spot where you can try the delicious tastes of traditional and authentic Pakistani food, adding to Missoula’s food and cultural diversity, you can expect the listed rewards.

For any donations received from outside of Missoula area and if you cannot visit us when we're open, we will do our best to get your T-shirts mailed to you as soon we are able to. Also, if and when you're in Missoula, please come say hi and we will take care of you the only way we know- Pakistani hospitality style. For catering donations, we can certainly schedule a date where you will be in Missoula and would like to take advantage of that perk.

 

Risks and Challenges

 

Obviously, there is always a risk of failure, and to be honest, that risk is part of the reason why I have shied away from this endeavor until now. But I believe now is the time to make my dream a reality – now is the time for Missoula to experience authentic Pakistani food that is rich in flavor, made with love, and warms the soul.

 

During these extraordinary times in which we find ourselves, I understand that not everyone is able to contribute financially to this project. However, I would be very thankful for your support, encouragement, and patronage when we do open. I hope the people of Missoula are as excited as Megan and I are for this project, and I hope you will show your support by opening your hearts and your wallets to make this a success and help us add something new to your dining options!

*Photo Courtesy: Sara Diggins @ Montana Kaimin

story:
Most people don't know which knives they need and what specific knives are used for.  The result?  A cheap knife block or drawer full of knives you hardly ever use or don't know how to effectively use.  

The truth is there are 4 knives you need in your kitchen.

- Its 2018.  We live in a world full of processed foods.  Just walk down the aisles at your local grocery store.  Most of it is packaged, processed, and refined.  The healthy food is typically on the perimeter of the grocery store.  Delicious and hearty fruits and vegetables, freshly butchered meats and fish.  These are the foods that mankind has thrived on for millennia.  We believe that people should have the right tools and know how to prepare delicious whole foods in their own kitchen.

Mission:

Having the right knife for each task in the kitchen helps to garner good cooking habits and will inspire you to learn the proper technique to create amazing dishes.  This is our mission at ORLO.     

 

With these 4 knives you will have everything you need to adequately and safely prepare nutritious whole foods in your kitchen.  

In conjunction with the knives, we want to provide you a culinary experience by creating videos to help you learn how to use them.  Our goal is to help you become the michelin star chef of your own kitchen.

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Fidaa I am a university and college graduate with a college diploma in Business and a university degree in business and humanities. Most of my background is in retail and restaurant management with a lot of knowledge in the health food and nutrition market. I have spent the last six years managing three restaurants in Ottawa. These three restaurants have a grown significantly financially in the last five years as well. While managing these three restaurants I have also had the opportunity to test the market with the products I would like Vegan Desires to carry including the organic juices, the vegan coffee beverages and vegan desserts and was very successful at doing so. With my success I believe I am ready to bring the full concept to Ottawa in my very own location and that Ottawa is ready for this and will be another hang out for Vegans, Vegetarians and health conscious people alike. 
  • My campaign is to raise funds to open a fully  vegan juice bar and cafe in Ottawa which will also be fully licensed to serve cocktails and other alcoholic beverages.  Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe will have a lot of vegan sweets and snacks, vegan coffee and non-caffeinated beverages, gluten-free options and juices as well as smoothies and cocktails, cocktails, and other alcoholic beverages. . The juice bar will also have an option for use of organic produce. As part of an initiative to maintain a green business, people who bring in their own cups, or mugs will receive a discount. A loyalty card will be in place to share our appreciation for our loyal customers.  Vegan Desires will also host board game nights and live bands on a weekly basis. The reason Vegan Desires Juice bar and Cafe is so important to me is because I have always had the desire to open a vegan juice bar and cafe in Ottawa where people can just sit down and relax and enjoy some vegan snacks and refreshments. Ottawa is a great city and the amount of not only vegans and vegetarians in Ottawa but as well as health conscious people in the city and even Canada as a whole is booming. That being said, there is a market for it and will help how people view the traditional run off the mill juice bar and cafe and will be the new hot spot for everyone who just wants to relax and grab a "vegan one". 
  • Contributors to this campaign will help me achieves my goals and life time dreams of opening Ottawa's first and only vegan juice bar and cafe which includes gluten- free options and option for organic produce for smoothies and juices. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • I will need need to raise $60 000 a long withy my savings  as part of my crowd funding campaign in order to open Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe. The $60 000 dollars will go towards: first and last month's rent, a few commercial blenders, commercial juicers, commercial espresso maker, commercial coffee maker, grab & go display, commercial fridge and freezer, a commercial dishwasher, inventory, and lastly the renovations and furnishings of the juice bar and cafe. 
  •  There are a lot of unique perks for people who choose to donate to this amazing campaign that would bring Ottawa's first and only vegan juice bar and cafe to life. These perks include:
$1 CAD

Virtual High-Five + Treat

Every single dollar counts in an effort to open Ottawa's first and only fully vegan cafe and juice bar. For each dollar donated, the donator will receive a virtual high five and a free vegan treat.


$5 CAD

Virtual Hug + Beverage

Every one likes getting hugs, especially if they know that they are making Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe a step closer in becoming a reality. You can also enjoy a free beverage of your choice.


$15 CAD

Love Is In The Air

For $15 you will receive a button or a magnet and a social media shout out, along with a free beverage or treat.

$50 CAD

Hemp Bracelet + mug + beverage

A special home crafted and custom made beaded hemp bracelet designed especially for you as a thank you for your love and compassion. As well you will receive an "I love animals" mug.


$150 CAD

Hemp Necklace and Gift Card

As a special thank you not only will you receive a custom designed beaded hemp necklace, but also a $25 gift card to the coffee shop of your choice.


$500 CAD

T-shirt

Vegan Lovin Treats

Those who donate $500 will receive an "Animals Are Friends Not food" T-Shirt, and a gift card for $25 dollars to the store of your choice and $50 to Vegan Desires, and 5 free beverages.


$1,000

Love Life combonation

A $1000 dollar contribution will entitle the donator to a card that gives them 10% off at Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe for 6 months. As well, I will donate 5% to the charity of your choice.


$1,500 CAD

Live The Vegan Life

For a $1500 donation you will receive a 2% royalty until you recoup your money and you will receive free beverages for 6 months.


$2,000 CAD

Pura vida royalty and beverage

If you donate $2000 you will have a product named after you at Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe and a 1% royalty for when someone buys the product named after you. As well as 5% royalty until you recoup your money. As well, you will receive free beverages for 12 months.


  • If I do not reach my funding goal I will seek an angel investor or a business loan to cover the difference.  In every way possible I would like to see Vegan Desires Juice bar and Cafe sweep the nation's capital off its feet and give Ottawa health nuts and non-health nuts a like the much needed vegan cafe and juice bar.

The Impact

  • My project and quest to open Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe which would be a fully lisenced vegan juice bar and cafe stems from not only a passion for healthy food, exercise and nutrition but a longing for a place where people can also enjoy not only vegan options but organic and gluten-free options as well. The reason this project is valuable to the contributors and to the world is because many people are against consuming animal products as a choice in order to not support cruelty to animals and instead choose a vegan diet to live a  "cruelty-free life". As well, many people choose a vegan diet due to dietary restriction that involve lactose intolerance and allergy to eggs amongst the dislike of consuming meat. Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe will also be a host to gluten-free products because there are many that suffer from celiac disease and there bodies are not able to process gluten and must stay away from such foods that contain wheat and barley. Giving customers the option for organic produce not only helps the environment, but as well the customer as well as organic is the cleaner way to go as it is GMO free and free from pesticides, herbicides and other chemicals often found in conventional foods and are harmful to our bodies. Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe will also have an excellent composting and recycling program in place and will classify itself as a green business. Compost and recycling bins will be placed in the store and we will ensure that we have as little of a eco footprint as possible. As well, customers who bring in their own mug, cup, glass, or protein shaker will receive a discount on their beverage. Customers that bring in their own reusable plate will receive a discount on the snack foods. There will also be a loyalty card in place to reward our valued customers. The project is valuable to both the contributor and the world because not not only does this value the health and prosperity of the contributor, customers and the world, but as well it minimizes the eco foot because no animal products are being used and a great recycling and compost program will be put in place to ensure that it remains a green business. 

Risks & Challenges

I fully believe in my vision for Vegan Desires Juice Bar and Cafe and fully understand I am stepping into a very competitive space with many unforeseen obstacles to come. However,  I am putting my diploma in business and humanities degree to good use a long with my years of retail and restaurant management experience. I will also be turning to my fellow vegan friends for mentorship as they have agreed to help me and I know they will be there to help me every step of the way along side my family and many other friends. I will also seek mentorship from my brother who is successfully running three restaurants and my good friend in St.Catharines, Ontario  that has her Gluten-Free business. 

Even though I am in a competitive space and will be competing against other coffee shops and juice bars  I know that Ottawa residents especially vegans and vegetarians will enjoy having a  juice bar and cafe offering vegan, gluten -free and organic choices. Vegan Desires will also be fully licensed and will offer vegan cocktails, mocktails and organic, gluten-free alcoholic beverages.  This will not only differentiate me from the traditional cafes and juice bars, but will also lead to my success as people want change and more people each day are seeking not only vegan and gluten free options, but organic as well. As well, a lot of vegans and vegetarians are always on the look out for a nice place where they can enjoy vegan beverages and snacks. 


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people can't contribute, but that does not mean they can't help. 
  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. 
  • Please use Indiegogo's share tools. 
  • Please like us on Twitter and Facebook.

story:
Be part of a Healthy Investment

Finotaste had its inception one year ago and was founded by Emanuela Menezes and her husband, Junior Menezes, an award-winner chef who has worked in the field for over 15 years. 

Before Finotaste officially started its operations a year ago, we had already invested 6 months into researching and developing our recipes to make them as healthy and tasty as possible.

We have reached a customer base that includes body builders, professional football players, food bloggers and many personal trainers.

Help us spread this concept around London and UK.

 

A lot of hard work has been done already...

Marketing will be our priority as the structure has already been built.

We will also invest in the creation of our own APP in order to allow direct communication with our customers, and provide them with tools to follow up their progress. However, the biggest slice of the funds will go to the implementation and maintenance of our Grab and Go stations. It includes logistics, training personnel, and working capital.

If we don't reach our target we'll reduce the number of Grab and Go stations accordingly, but we are confident that this is a unique investment opportunity. 

 

The Market

In a hectic city such as London, people don’t usually get much time to look after themselves when it comes to healthy eating habits.

People are constantly trying to lose weight, build lean mass or simply have a balanced diet.

Finotaste was designed to offer customers customised meal programs to help them achieve their goals.

We aim at delivering customers full of flavour, natural, superfoods that will bring pleasure to their table.

Weight loss represents over 70% of the market and shows no signs of slowing down.  It is largely fueled by women ranging from twenty-year-olds to forty-year-olds. Men also seek fat loss but also usually opt for personalised fitness programs as well. The fitness and wellbeing market is a smaller slice but it consists of people who can immediately understand the benefits of our programs.

 

Healthy Challenges

We consider the barriers to keep the business are low.

There are a number of companies already offering bespoke food in London, but, we believe, that none of them offers a dietician service such as ours. Finotaste aims to renew the bespoke healthy food market.

To distinguish our concept from those of our competitors and help retain/gain long term clients we serve a healthy modern European dietary program, prepared to the highest standards and sourcing organic ingredients for many of the meal products.

Our survey has shown that our services are quite new and not many people were aware of them. We believe that what makes us stand out is the fact that we have an experienced chef looking after the whole process.

We aim to be 100% gluten and sugar-free and 90% Dairy free. We believe that these features differentiate us from our competitors which makes it even more attractive to target customers.

 

Marketing strategy

Social media and google AdWords have been our main marketing channels so far.

As we have already mentioned a large part of the investment will be used to increase our digital presence on the channels above.

We believe people need to taste our products to understand their benefits and the Grab 'n Go stations will play an essential role in making it possible.

We also intend to invest in brand ambassadors to keep a high online presence, and for them to confirm the quality of our products and the efficiency of our services.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word of this Healthy Investment.  We need as much support as possible to make it happen, and we'd really appreciate your help by sharing this campaign with Personal Trainers, Dietitians, body-builders and all healthy people you may know.
story_txt:
Be part of a Healthy Investment
Finotaste had its inception one year ago and was founded by Emanuela Menezes and her husband, Junior Menezes, an award-winner chef who has worked in the field for over 15 years. 
Before Finotaste officially started its operations a year ago, we had already invested 6 months into researching and developing our recipes to make them as healthy and tasty as possible.
We have reached a customer base that includes body builders, professional football players, food bloggers and many personal trainers.
Help us spread this concept around London and UK.

 

A lot of hard work has been done already...
Marketing will be our priority as the structure has already been built.
We will also invest in the creation of our own APP in order to allow direct communication with our customers, and provide them with tools to follow up their progress. However, the biggest slice of the funds will go to the implementation and maintenance of our Grab and Go stations. It includes logistics, training personnel, and working capital.
If we don't reach our target we'll reduce the number of Grab and Go stations accordingly, but we are confident that this is a unique investment opportunity. 

 

The Market
In a hectic city such as London, people don’t usually get much time to look after themselves when it comes to healthy eating habits.
People are constantly trying to lose weight, build lean mass or simply have a balanced diet.
Finotaste was designed to offer customers customised meal programs to help them achieve their goals.
We aim at delivering customers full of flavour, natural, superfoods that will bring pleasure to their table.
Weight loss represents over 70% of the market and shows no signs of slowing down.  It is largely fueled by women ranging from twenty-year-olds to forty-year-olds. Men also seek fat loss but also usually opt for personalised fitness programs as well. The fitness and wellbeing market is a smaller slice but it consists of people who can immediately understand the benefits of our programs.


 
Healthy Challenges
We consider the barriers to keep the business are low.
There are a number of companies already offering bespoke food in London, but, we believe, that none of them offers a dietician service such as ours. Finotaste aims to renew the bespoke healthy food market.
To distinguish our concept from those of our competitors and help retain/gain long term clients we serve a healthy modern European dietary program, prepared to the highest standards and sourcing organic ingredients for many of the meal products.
Our survey has shown that our services are quite new and not many people were aware of them. We believe that what makes us stand out is the fact that we have an experienced chef looking after the whole process.
We aim to be 100% gluten and sugar-free and 90% Dairy free. We believe that these features differentiate us from our competitors which makes it even more attractive to target customers.

 
Marketing strategy
Social media and google AdWords have been our main marketing channels so far.
As we have already mentioned a large part of the investment will be used to increase our digital presence on the channels above.
We believe people need to taste our products to understand their benefits and the Grab 'n Go stations will play an essential role in making it possible.
We also intend to invest in brand ambassadors to keep a high online presence, and for them to confirm the quality of our products and the efficiency of our services.


 
Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word of this Healthy Investment.  We need as much support as possible to make it happen, and we'd really appreciate your help by sharing this campaign with Personal Trainers, Dietitians, body-builders and all healthy people you may know.

story:
WHO WE ARE:

StopMyCraving is a revolutionary company that helps you find tasty, healthy and ethical alternatives for your cravings matching your dietary needs and lifestyle!

Check out here how it all began! 

WHY USE STOPMYCRAVING

On StopMyCraving's e-commerce platform that we will launch in a few months, you can type in your dietary needs and lifestyle and be matched with a wide range of healthy products suitable for you. For example, if you are allergic to gluten, if you are vegan or you are simply trying to maintain a healthy lifestyle, we will immediately show you the perfect products for you! We take the pain away from reading labels and looking for hours online and further create easy access to your preferred products by delivering to your door.

SUPPORTING SMALL PRODUCERS AND THE LOCAL ENVIRONMENT:

We believe in a sustainable world, therefore all our displayed products come from small natural producers around Europe. Thanks to our platform, all our suppliers can now sell in a easier and cost efficient way, avoiding the large fees they would otherwise incur with normal supermarkets, making it possible for us to pass the savings onto you, our valued customer.

We create a win-win-win, by making a healthy lifestyle easier, supporting the small guy and promoting sustainable choices!

PRICING

There is no settled limit on the size or weight of your box, we will only ask you to start building it from a minimum order of £25 on the platform. If you pre buy from Indiegogo you can receive 15-35% discounts on orders.

CORPORATE SOLUTIONS

We also provide corporate solutions in order to answer the need for healthy snacks and drinks at meetings, events, gyms, hospitals and universities. We can also supply vending machines. We will help you make your office, school or similar, a happy healthy place!

Give your employees convenient ‘grab and go’ access to healthy foods so they can be properly fuelled and enhance their productivity. 

Your team will appreciate your commitment to their improved health and well-being, helping increase staff retention and office morale.

Corporate orders are subject to a minimum order of £100 delivery.

ETHICAL PACKAGING:

All StopMyCraving boxes are made with recyclable materials, and have that pop and trendy look that will make you or your loved ones smile when arriving at your door step!

We provide different sizes, and you can decide to customize your box with the products you prefer. Looking at your profile, we will give you some suggestions based  on your dietary needs and lifestyle but you can also search for specific products. It will be you, and ONLY YOU, who will then select the exact items to put in your box. You can decide to get a one off or subscribe.

HOW TO ORDER:

After searching for your preferred products and creating a personal profile on StopMyCraving.com, you will be able to place your order and pay directly online, with Paypal or credit card. Insert your details, and you will receive your box within 24-48 hours.

We ship all over Europe: No more stress going crazy looking for your dream products!

TEAM:

Our initial team is composed of 7 people in the immediate team. Our founder and CEO, CTO, full stack developer, a data analyst, a marketing social media manager, a UX/UI designer and a nutritionist who approves the products.

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We are already operating on a small scale, but need your help to build out our operations in order to expand across Europe and the US. In the near future we need to increase our capacity to help as many as possible eat healthy and tasty products tailored to their dietary needs and lifestyle. 

Join us in helping people embrace their cravings without feeling restricted!

 

StopMyCraving: Enjoy snacking, enjoy life!

 

READ OUR STORY: 

Once upon a time, there was a girl standing in the kitchen, craving cookies…

"Hi everyone,

I am Sofie, and here is my story of how StopMyCraving was born.

Nowadays I am a married woman with normal family life ups and downs, and I am the CEO and founder of StopMyCraving. Just a short while ago I was only a student with little work experience but a big dream. But no one imagines that before this I was a high school drop out with an eating disorder.

The high school academic board told me “you will never become anything if you drop out”. Adamant to prove them wrong, there was never a question in my mind that I wanted to go to university and finish my courses. And I made it to my dream education!

But life never ceases to challenge you. Along the way I developed a back injury which meant I was unable to move for three months. Having been an an ice skater, society taught me “you will never be good enough if you are not skinny enough or look a certain way”. Can you imagine me, an athlete with an eating disorder, being closed in the house doing nothing all day? I felt physically and mentally stuck! I knew then I had to take charge and change my life if I wanted to recover and live a long, high quality life

From my bed, I started researching about cravings and found an article from Harvard saying:

“To beat a craving you have to meet a craving.”

I was blown away and thought “If this study is true, why has nobody heard about this before?" I said to myself “To meet my cravings, I have to find healthier alternatives if I don’t want to get a load of other problems at the end of this”.

The same day I was in the kitchen looking at a pack of cookies asking myself “How do I know what goes into this and where can I find a healthier alternative matching my needs? How can I stop my craving?” I started searching for healthier alternatives online and the food information was scattered. It took me a lot of time to see where to get my preferred products and none of them were available at the same store. Being time restricted and physically low on energy due to my injury, I was unable to walk to ten different stores to get what I needed. Later that day I was at the supermarket and started hearing people say, “I wish I could find a healthier low fat product”, “Where can I find this as an organic alternative”, “My son has ADHD and we have to find sugar free alternatives”, “My daughter has an egg allergy and we have to plan four hours each week to do the grocery shopping, combined with our busy work lives.”

I took it as a sign and said to myself "We need to do something about it!" I began scribbling down ideas and this is how StopMyCraving was born. It started as search engine app where we could type in preferences and see where to buy the products. Through the prototype it became clear that we needed to deliver directly to people. That is what StopMyCraving is about today.

We want to help you find tasty alternatives matching your personal dietary needs & lifestyle, delivering products directly to your door. So stay healthy, save time and money using StopMyCraving."

Join the food revolution today!

                                                                                                    -  Sofie Dralle, Founder & CEO

story:
Food fuels our lives. It allows us to function and gives us energy through the day. What we choose to eat for lunch can make or break our performance for the day. Most of the time, we opt for unhealthy meals because we think they are “time-savers”, when in reality, with our product, that couldn't be further from the truth.
 
 
 

Silbo will take care of everything you need for a meal on the go – from planning and preparing, to cooling and heating the food in seconds, while tracking, analyzing and managing your dietary needs and even has a built in power bank, just in case you need to recharge your mobile devices as well as refueling your body. Let us do the hard work for you so you can enjoy the best and coolest experience of food on the go.

With an elegant & luxurious design that is water-proof, dust-proof and leak-proof, made entirely from Green, Environmentally Friendly, Anti-bacterial and Food Safe materials Silbo provides an easy and convenient way to eat your healthy & delicious meals anywhere & anytime.

With Silbo, you can be sure that your meal is always at the right temperature. Your food will stay fresh & cold thanks to our efficient cooling system (up to 12 hours), When you’re ready to heat up your meal, just click the button and you're all set! We developed an eco-friendly  heating system to give your food the warmth it needs in seconds – you can heat each cell separately to the desired temperature, this means no more hot salad or cold pasta with your meal!

Silbo is equipped with strong and quality power bank with a capacity of 14,000mAh that can charge all your mobile devices anywhere & anytime and needs to be recharged JUST once a week! (NORMAL USE)

Silbo makes mornings easier and better. Prepare your meal the night before, place your masterpiece in the refrigerator overnight and pop it in your bag the next morning for an efficient start to your day!

You can even order additional compartments to make planning your food for the
week even easier!

Silbo connect to your smart device via Bluetooth 5.0 and it's customized for every SMARTPHONE, TABLET and SMARTWATCH, fits both ANDROID and IOS.

Most of the time we can't track and calculate the amount of calories, fat, proteins, sugar and carbohydrates we eat, But with Silbo’s unique sensors and our own intelligent algorithm you can measure, track, analyze, monitor and manage your eating habits and dietary needs with the healthiest & tastiest recipes EVER...

Also, it's a great social network and you can share your recipes and find new friends.

Today we are more health conscious than ever before and unfortunately we can't control what is going into the food that we purchase from outside our homes. We're not aware of the amount of calories, fat, carbs and protein we're eating and whether there are ingredients that can harm our health.

Besides wasting a lot of time waiting on line, the time getting to the restaurant and waiting for the food to be ready... oh and there's also the way back, We also spend a lot of money!  (Buying an average meal, is 300% more expensive than making the same meal at home.)

NOW, with Silbo, it can't be more easier and comfortable to enjoy fresh, warm and healthy meals and count, track and manage the nutritional values we eat no matter where we are and SAVE a lot of time and money!

After an in-depth study of the market and our own engineered prototypes, we have designed Silbo to be the perfect size and it can be carried VERTICALLY and HORIZONTALLY.

   

Silbo has plenty of space to accommodate all your lunch needs, making the experience that much easier and efficient, whilst still remaining small enough to comfortably fit into every bag.

Silbo is simple and easy to clean. the ANTI-SCRATCH & NONSTICK stainless steel compartments are easily removable and dishwasher safe. Also you can wash it manually under water.

Silbo is perfect for everyone, whether you are an athlete looking to ease the hard work of tracking macro nutrients, a business man, lawyer, high-tech employee or a student trying to reach your health goals or just fit an easy hot fresh meal around your busy schedule, Silbo was made for you.

        

        

Just as we like to personalize our homes, phones and accessories, together we can raise enough funds to allow us personalize your Silbo as you wish... Let's make Silbo customize happen!!!

In order to begin mass production, we have to reach $40,000 to cover our overhead costs.

Our dedicated team is working day and night in order to make this great product and improve your quality of life.

story:
Short Summary

Quick, Flavorful, Hot and On-the-Go....... This is how a large percentage of coffee drinkers consume their daily cup of coffee.  

Hello, my name is Donna Royston, founder of CoffeeStixx.  On a recent flight, I noticed several passengers struggling through various different condiments to create the "perfect" cup of coffee. I quickly recognized how valuable it would be to have a pre-measured option for consumers who just wanted that perfect cup of coffee on the go without having to visit an expensive coffee house to do so.  

I recently launched a new product that combines the benefits of four products into one, saving consumers both time and money. CoffeeStix will add to the convenience of your coffee drinking experience by allowing consumers to cream, flavor, sweeten, and stir their coffee that is perfectly prepared up in 90 seconds or less.   

CoffeeStix, like the name suggests, starts with a stick dressed with with a candy like substance on the end. Our solid solution houses the flavoring and sweetener in addition to including a non-dairy creamer. While it is dissolving consumers also enjoy the convenience of having the coffee stirrer readily available.

CoffeeStix comes in an assortment of flavors including French Vanilla, Hazelnut, Chocolate Mousse, Salted Caramel and seasonal varieties like Pumpkin Spice, Vanilla Caramel. and Chocolate Peppermint.

Growing Our Product Touchpoints

We would like to increase our production capabilities and grow our footprint to expand to service customers via a comprehensive digital presence as well as retail outlets across the US.  Your assistance will help offset our production costs, allow us to grow into other warm beverage segments faster and increase market penetration in various "key" locations outside of the state of Texas.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not a coffee enthusiast,  there are several ways you can still help us with achieving our fundraising goal:

#1: Choose to donate a the $2-$5 level

#2: Gift one of our products to a friend or loved one

#3: Share this campaign with everyone in your network by using the various social tools through the Indiegogo platform. 

Please tell everyone you  know and make your coffee smile!!

story:
Everyone knows how much fun it is to go out drinking with friends, gather for birthdays, bachelor/bachelorette parties, happy hours, wine tastings, after-hour business entertaining, and big game events...

Most of us also know how it makes you feel the next morning. Dead.

Now, imagine hopping out of bed the next day with a smile, feeling sharp and ready to go, without having to hide that hangover at work with aspirin and coffee... It’s just another fine day with your normal healthy energy and ability to focus!

 

Power Defender is the 3 oz shot designed to alleviate hangover symptoms while also providing long term liver health support. Only Power Defender contains both L-ornithine which removes ammonia... and DHM which removes acetaldehyde. If your body has high concentrations of either one of these alcohol related toxins, then you're most likely stuck with your hangover. That's why we created Power Defender to deliver a one-two punch!

The point of Power Defender is to bring long term support for liver health and also immediately soothe the worst symptoms of the morning after.

 

 

Did you know that after consuming 2-3 drinks your liver stops filtering the alcohol and turns it into an ammonia drenched toxic soup? This toxic soup damages your liver then spreads to your brain through your bloodstream. This toxic ammonia is what makes you feel and act drunk. It causes fatigue, erectile dysfunction, and it is also the main culprit for hangovers when left in your system.

 

To start we included an ingredient called L-Arginine. Without getting too technical it creates nitric oxide. The 1998 Nobel Prize for Medicine winning research showed that nitric oxide protects your heart, stimulates your brain, kills unwanted bacteria, and increases blood circulation in your body. So, it's not just to sidestep a hangover, it's actually great for your body and mind as well.

Power Defender is the only anti-hangover shot that contains L-Ornithine. This scavenger ingredient rounds up and rids your body and brain of this nasty ammonia. When drinking you’ll feel amazingly clear and put together. By eliminating the ammonia, when you wake up, you’ll feel sharp and focused instead of feeling like you got hit by a train. We also put in DHM (Dihydromyricetin) which is the widely used ingredient to help hangovers but DHM by itself does not remove the ammonia.

 

 

Nearly three years of research speaking with doctors at the Mayo Clinic, tracking pharma companies such as Ocera, and developing formulations with PhDs, Fortune Drink was able to create a combination of ingredients like nothing else out there. The key is the ability to actually REMOVE toxins from the body, starting with ammonia which attacks the liver and the brain.

FOR INTERNATIONAL INQUIRIES PLEASE CONTACT US AT: support@fortunedrink.com

 

In Silicon Valley, Robert Chen and Tony Chen are the father and son team behind Fortune Drink’s Power Defender®. The journey to the Power Defender® launch began nearly three years ago with Robert first taking a hard look at liver disease in China. Later, the pair would apply what they learned to the U.S. as well.

 

Robert Chen 

In his career, Robert headed Asia Pacific offices for Fortune 500 corporations such as Motorola, Compaq Computer, Symantec and Digital Equipment. In these roles, he headed up sales activities worth over $500.0 million of dollars and had to understand the culture in which sales in Asia are conducted.

Tony Chen

In early 2017, Robert invited his son Tony to helm the launch Fortune Drink Inc. Tony has more than 20 years experience in managing Hi-tech Companies in Silicon Valley with a degree in Applied Mathematics from Carnegie Mellon University and an MBA from UC Berkeley. Tony has worked with numerous Silicon Valley startups as well as Fortune 500 companies such as Sun Microsystems/Oracle. Additionally, Tony has nearly a decade worth of experience working at startups and at SolarCity/Tesla on renewable energy project development during the high growth years of solar, energy storage, and other renewables. Says Tony, “Robert is more the visionary. I like go-to market strategy, analysis, and then execution”. We compliment each other well.”

 

What is Power Defender? 

  • Power Defender is formulated to remove alcohol toxins and ammonia toxins from your liver, blood stream and brain. It supports your body's normal metabolism after drinking alcohol. Try Power Defender before drinking alcohol to wake up feeling focused and ready for the day!

When is the best time to consume Power Defender? 

  • Based on the formulation of the product, Power Defender should be taken before drinking alcohol and another bottle before going to bed so you wake up feeling fantastic the next morning. Shake well and enjoy!

What's in the formula? 

  • Power Defender’s main ingredients are: L-ornithine, L-arginine, dihydromyricetin (DHM), L-cysteine, resveratrol, grape seed extract, L-glutathione, milk thistle, taurine, anti-oxidants and 27 Vitamins.

What is L-ornithine? 

  • L-ornithine is an amino acid that reduces the concentration of the toxin ammonia from the liver, blood vessels and brain. Studies indicate that as a nutritional supplement, L-ornithine prevents fatigue.

What is L-arginine? 

  • An additional benefit of L-arginine is its ability to improve blood flow and circulation to the heart, brain, and both the male and female reproductive systems. This has multiple benefits, including promoting immune function, fertility, detoxification and brain power.
  • Another amino acid, L-arginine keeps the liver, skin, joints, and muscles healthy. It helps detoxify the liver by neutralizing the effects of ammonia and other toxic substances.

What is DHM? 

  • DHM stands for Dihydromyricetin. This natural flavanoid is found in the Oriental Raisin Tree and helps to support the body's natural detoxification processes. Flavanoids are plant-based nutrients that have an abundance of health benefits. These benefits have been studied extensively and are most famous for their anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory purposes.

Does Power Defender contain caffeine?

  • Power Defender contains zero caffeine.

I have a dietary restriction; can I still use Power Defender? 

  • Should you have a specific dietary restriction, please consult your physician before drinking Power Defender.

Are your products FDA approved? 

  • Dietary supplements are not reviewed and approved by FDA. Our products are over the counter dietary supplements; they cannot be 'approved' by the FDA. However, the ingredients are all manufactured and packaged in F.D.A. inspected and approved facilities that adhere to very strict standards.

Are your products safe? 

  • Yes. Our products meets the strict safety standards of the Dietary Health and Supplements Act and the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. But, as with all health products, each person is different and we recommend you carefully look over our ingredients and speak to your physician before taking our products.

How do I store Power Defender? 

  • Power Defender should be stored at room temperature. You can also refrigerate it before consuming. Please do not freeze the product or expose it to prolonged sunlight and heat. Once you break the safety seal, you should drink the entire 3 oz. bottle.

Where is Power Defender Manufactured? 

  • Power Defender is manufactured and packaged in USA (Tampa, Florida) at a laboratory that: - Meets or exceeds all Current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP). - Has a GMP certification with an "A" rating (the highest possible) from the National Nutritional Foods Association (NNFA). - Holds a Drug Manufacturing License issued by the Food & Drug Branch of the Florida Department of Health Services. This ensures our products are produced in a laboratory that adheres to the quality-control standards required to manufacture prescription and over-the-counter pharmaceutical medications.

Is Power Defender a drug? 

  • No. Power Defender is not a drug. It is a dietary supplement.

Is Power Defender safe? 

  • Yes. As a dietary supplement, Power Defender’s package labeling, ingredients and manufacturing quality are regulated by the FDA pursuant to the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act. Power Defender meets the strict safety standards of the Dietary Health and Supplements Act and the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

Can I drink Power Defender while on medications? 

  • Everyone is different and so is every medication. We highly suggest that you talk to a physician if you are concerned.

Can I drink Power Defender if I am pregnant? 

  • If you are pregnant, please check with your physician before drinking Power Defender.

Is Power Defender available internationally?

  • Yes! But additional shipping charges will apply. If you don't see your country listed, please email support@fortunedrink.com.

How does it taste? 

  • We love Power Defender’s mango-lime flavor. We also encourage you to try Power Defender over ice or mixing it with your favorite beverage. Let us know what combinations you like. We might feature your creation on our blog!

How do I contact you for more questions? 

  • We look forward to answering your questions about Power Defender!

Email support@fortunedrink.com with any other questions you might have!

 

For more detailed information please click on these links: 

Acetaldehyde

The toxic effects of acetaldehyde

https://pubs.niaaa.nih.gov/publications/aa72/aa72.htm

Ammonia

What happens when the liver does not clear ammonia quickly enough...

https://medlineplus.gov/ency/article/000302.htm 

http://www.clevelandclinicmeded.com/medicalpubs/diseasemanagement/hepatology/hepatic-encephalopathy/ 

Dihydromyricetin (DHM)

DHM for anti-alcohol

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3292407/
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26751438

L-arginine

L-arginine as a vasodialator and ED treatment

  • https://www.mayoclinic.org/drugs-supplements-l-arginine/art-20364681

Improves circulation

  • https://www.webmd.com/heart/arginine-heart-benefits-and-side-effects#1 

L-arginine to Nitric Oxide pathway

  • https://academic.oup.com/jn/article/134/10/2748S/4688471

L-ornithine

Ornithine cycle (aka urea cycle) removes ammonia from body

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19083482
  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Urea_cycle 
  • https://www.news-medical.net/health/What-is-the-Urea-Cycle.aspx 

L-ornithine improves quality of sleep and mood

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055948/ 

L-ornithine for antifatigue

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19083482

Dead.Now, imagine hopping out of bed the next day with a smile, feeling sharp and ready to go, without having to hide that hangover at work with aspirin and coffee... It’s just another fine day with your normal healthy energy and ability to focus! Power Defender is the 3 oz shot designed to alleviate hangover symptoms while also providing long term liver health support. Only Power Defender contains both L-ornithine which removes ammonia... and DHM which removes acetaldehyde. If your body has high concentrations of either one of these alcohol related toxins, then you're most likely stuck with your hangover. That's why we created Power Defender to deliver a one-two punch!The point of Power Defender is to bring long term support for liver health and also immediately soothe the worst symptoms of the morning after. 

 
Did you know that after consuming 2-3 drinks your liver stops filtering the alcohol and turns it into an ammonia drenched toxic soup? story:
Short Summary

Company Deep River Distillers, LLC                                           Founder Paul Grabek

July 4, 2013 is a pivotal date; not only because we celebrate America's independence krew Vodka was born. several family members remarked how difficult it was to find commercially made Wisniowka; a cherry flavored vodka often enjoyed on Christmas Eve by the Polish. I, Paul Grabek founder of Krew Vodka, offered a solution to privately distill, small batches of a cherry flavored vodka for all to enjoy on Christmas Eve.  Falling back on my chemist work experience,  I settled on a formulation that I believed was very close to the original cherry favored Wisniowka. Much to my delight and a blind taste test on Christmas Eve 2013, the home made Wisniowka was the resounding winner. With this confidence boost,  I began experimenting with various vodka mash bases including Potato, Corn and Wheat. The winning mash is corn - gluten free! The resulting product was added to the distillation flask and distilled in the standard fashion. The ethanol was treated to remove various impurities. The resulting pure ethanol (180 proof) was diluted down to 80 proof with filtered water and then bottled. The entire process is truly enjoyable and understanding the chemistry behind  the distillation fuels my passion. I simply love to watch the entire process unfold.  Of course, focus group and sampling efforts have taken place - reaching over 700 people! And their feedback has been instrumental in preparing me to launch this campaign.

Krew vodka was awarded it's first accolade in the 2017 at the ADI (American Distillers Institute) craft distillers competition. And received a Bronze Award in the national competition!

The branding, marketing and packaging are complete. We are now looking  to scale up the project to bring this product to the local market starting in Connecticut.

My goal is to share Krew vodka with the world; and I need your help to help make my dream a reality. By contributing to my passion project, you will be a part of my company and fulfill an entrepreneur's dream. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for serious Round One investors to help with operational fees, securing the commercial manufacturing plant, distilling equipment (i.e. fermentation tanks, bottling equipment) and overhead (i.e. rent, utilities, advertising, events).  We are looking to raise $500,000 in working capital by November 2018 in preparation for a soft, local market product launch in January 2019. Hard launch is planned for Q2'19.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Krew Vodka  will be one of the first domestic (made in the US ) ultra premium vodkas planned to hit the local Connecticut market in January 2019. Our single distillation process produces an exceptionally smooth tasting and clear hand-crafted, naked vodka. It is produced, distilled and bottled along the Connecticut coastline.  
  • Krew vodka, the flagship product of Deep River Distillers, LLC.,  has already won its first accolade in the 2017 ADI  (American Distillers Institute ) craft distillers competition. And received a Bronze Award in the national competition! 
  • We have 9 years of distillation experience. We come at this project from the point of view of a chemist, who understands the distillation process.  We also have over 20 years of sales and marketing experience.  We have scaled up several  products from bench  to pilot plant and production level. We have the Knowledge, Skill, Experience and Passion to bring this produce to the market.
  • We invite you to join our crew to help bring Krew to the market. 

Risks & Challenges

The risk is brand recognition and penetrating the market.  Currently, Krew vodka does not have a strong brand awareness as it's in its infancy. With the campaign goal of $500,000 we will focus on grass root  and social media outreach efforts to begin sharing Krew. From there, broader marketing/advertising efforts will include hand distributing to local bars, restaurants, hotels and catering companies. We are also entering local taste testing events to introduce are vodka to the local Connecticut market before launching globally.  Once the the business is up and running, we will be hosting distillery tours and will have a tasting room which will be open to the general public.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You dont have to contribute to the funding to be apart of Deep Rivers Distillers, LLC to support and be part of the team.  We value your suggestions and support for new products and ideas.  If you have tried our vodka  we invite to you to post a review on our website  Krewvodka.com.  Thank you for your support and encouragement.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

You dont have to contribute to the funding to be apart of Deep Rivers Distillers, LLC to support and be part of the team.  We value your suggestions and support for new products and ideas.  If you have tried our vodka  we invite to you to post a review on our website  Krewvodka.com.  Thank you for your support and encouragement.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Meet CREATE Gallery & Cocktail Lounge:

 

It’s been six years since our first CREATE event. What started as a simple idea. An idea rooted in collaboration, community and celebration. A celebration of art, food, music and drink on a level playing field. A showcase of Boston’s brightest artists, chefs, bartenders and musicians.

Today we evolve from event to brick & mortar. CREATE Gallery & Cocktail Lounge is opening this fall in Union Sq, Somerville at Bow Market.

Our mission statement has always been the same. Develop a larger platform for artists. Create a catalyst to show how much talent we have here. Talents that struggle to find notoriety. Talents worthy of our attention.

For six years we’ve given these artists an opportunity for 3-4 hours, one day each year. This fall we’ll be able to give them residencies in our space year round. This is a major accomplishment for our brand but we need your help. We need your support.

 

About CREATE Gallery & Cocktail:

Our space will be (trying to find the right word for small) charming. Our calendar will be filled with 45-60 day residencies for our artists. We’ll program themes and collaborations. We’ll make all the art available for sale. Originals & prints. We’ll highlight our artists through our social media, providing you with insight into who they are, what they do and when to find them at the gallery.

And we’ll serve up cocktails. All draft cocktails. Our cocktails will be unique collaborations with the best bartenders in Boston and friends from around the country. And of course, we’ll always have an offering from Tavern Road in the memory of Ryan McGrale. We know you miss the Down n’ Brown and Bees Knees.

We’ll provide the music and host the party every night. Stop by one of the many food kiosks on the ground floor of Bow Market and bring up snacks. We can fit about 20 people so plan on bringing friends and making a few more before you leave.

I’ve worked in kitchens my whole life. Ingredients and products were my passion. We formed culinary teams and built family in our restaurants. CREATE Gallery & Cocktail will follow this blueprint bringing artists together to develop a community of incredible talent and inspiration.

We’re counting on family, friends, fans of CREATE, the restaurant community & anyone who understands the immeasurable value artists provide our world to contribute to our campaign.

“Creativity takes courage” Let’s support that…..

Thank you, 

Louis DiBiccari

We’ll provide the music and host the party every night. Stop by one of the many food kiosks on the ground floor of Bow Market and bring up snacks. We can fit about 20 people so plan on bringing friends and making a few more before you leave.
I’ve worked in kitchens my whole life. Ingredients and products were my passion. We formed culinary teams and built family in our restaurants. CREATE Gallery & Cocktail will follow this blueprint bringing artists together to develop a community of incredible talent and inspiration.
We’re counting on family, friends, fans of CREATE, the restaurant community & anyone who understands the immeasurable value artists provide our world to contribute to our campaign.
“Creativity takes courage” Let’s support that…..
Thank you, 
Louis DiBiccari

story:
Levels is a concept created by four members of the Northshore who love community, food and games. Kevin and Ryn are a married couple out of Beverly MA, and opened The Castle: A Board Game Cafe in 2015. Jeremy and Keyvan have been friends since high school, and together decided to build The Game Pad - A Video Game Bar in Haverhill Ma in 2016.

 

In the past years both locations were successful, and showed the four of them that gaming socially and with great food and drink was something people in the Northshore wanted, and were passionate about.

 

When they met in 2016, it was obvious what the next step was: combine two awesome business models into one place where tabletop and console gamers alike could come, have food and drink, and enjoy hanging out together.

 

When the Northshore Mall approached the businesses with a space available to house their new concept, it was a no brainer to bring Levels to the Northshore!

 

Opening a space like this is a BIG step up from the two smaller businesses already existing, and we at Levels want to do it right. We’re looking for $50,000. That won’t fund the whole space, but it will help us do what needs to be done to add everything we need to make Levels the best place it can be. The $50,000 here will go toward getting the highest quality tables that combine both tabletop and video gaming, it will provide specialty add ons like high def projectors for major streamed events and large scale gaming competitions. We need your help to get this place to be the best possible place it can be!

 

We plan on showing our appreciation in a big way. If you want to have your own specialty gaming controller set aside for exclusively you, we can do that for you. Our high end tables will get YOUR name on them as a perk. You can have a night of gaming with three of your friends at Levels, alongside the four owners, all expenses paid! Do you like coffee? Would you like to never have to pay for one again for ever? We can do that too. For our highest end contributors we can give you the exclusive right to something to eat, drink and games to play. For Free. Forever. Check out all our perks and see if there’s something that calls to you!

 

The gaming industry is huge, and growing every day. Currently there aren’t many places gamers can go to relax and feel comfortable in their own environment. Levels will be that place. Ever been to a bar and seen ‘the big game’ on? Would you like that ‘big game’ to be the Overwatch World Cup? Or how about the League of Legends World Championship? We’ll have that.

 

Remember the good old days of playing Smash Brothers with a group of your friends in the living room or basement? Want to do that out and about, with a full menu of food and a whole bar’s worth of drinks? We’ll have that too.

 

This is a model that has successfully run with both The Castle and The Game Pad, people yearn for a community centered restaurant space where gaming can be a focus. Levels plans to be all that The Castl and The Game Pad is and more great cafe space for day time working, a full restaurant with pizza, burgers, and other delicious meals for lunch and dinner and a full stocked bar for late night gaming and hanging out.

 

The Northshore Mall is a great place, and has worked with us extensively to make us feel welcome. The space is a beautiful, two levels location that has everything we need to get up and running, but it’ll still be a lot of work, and we’ll be growing our two business models into sizes they’ve never been before. We’re building a talented, dedicated team to make this place a success, and we need your help with it.

 

If you’re excited about this project and want to help, please donate! If you don’t have a ton of money to spare, that’s fine! You can help by making noise about this wonderful opportunity- the more that know about this the better it can be!

 

Come alongside us, use the share buttons at the top of the page, and make this thing a success!

story:
Introduction

The Well is a place for people to come together for herbal drinks, food, kava, and tea in North Oakland.  We believe deeply that food is medicine and are working to re-ignite the collective wisdom of our ancestors and to put this traditional knowledge back in the hands of the people. We do this by serving delicious drinks and food, working with small local farmers, hosting educational workshops, and offering everything at affordable prices. The Well is now under new ownership, and we are planning to reopen on August 1st, 2018.

What is staying the same?

I am planning to continue many aspects of The Well business as was run by the previous owner Marielle. I hope to continue stewarding beloved community and I am committed to keeping the space as accessible, diverse, and inclusive as possible for all folks. Herbal drinks and eats will still be the focus of The Well, as reflected in our new menu. We will also continue to offer workshop space for community teachings. It will continue to be a kid friendly zone with toys and high chairs easily available. We will continue to source our ingredients from sustainable and ethical sources and strive to be as local and organic as possible. We will continue to pay our employees fair wages and offer benefits.

What is changing?

We will be creating a retail line of organic Chinese teas, drinking chocolate, and golden milk. We will have a space for tea ceremonies. We will also be adding kava to our menu. Kava is a root from the Pacific Islands that has relaxing and socializing effects. With the addition of kava and our hopes of being an alternative nightlife lounge, we will be expanding our hours to Mondays-Fridays 9am-midnight, Saturdays 9am-6pm with select special evening events, and Sundays 9am-9pm. We will also offer one “karma bowl” and “karma drink” per day. These will be “pay what you can” meals in order to keep healthy food accessible to the entire community. The karma bowls will be rotating rice bowls with fresh greens, vegetarian proteins, and culinary herbs. The karma drinks will be rotating herbal teas served hot or cold. We will also be adding a cold case for grab-and-go items. Additionally, we will be adding weekly community events, such as open mics, art nights, and curated workshops.

What Are You Funding?

I have already committed $90,000 of my personal saving to the buying of the business. We need around $24,000 more to implement some incredible changes listed below. My hope is to avoid high-interest bank loans and instead try out this alternative model of crowdfunding. Thank you for participating in the next economy. 

  • Expanded kava bar
  • Chinese tea tasting & ceremony corner
  • Cold case for grab-and-go items
  • Stage for community events like open mic
  • Expanded outdoor seating (with vertical gardens!)
  • More lounge seating
  • PA system for open mic and performances
  • Kava and teaware
  • Initial stock of retail section for local herbalists & creators
  • Commercial egg cooker
  • Kombucha on tap
  • Marketing & communications
  • Rainy day cushion
  • Ability to hang curated community art
  • An indoor living wall
  • New retail shelving
  • Dishwasher
  • Projectors to showcase local filmmakers

What you get

We have some incredible perks that are offered at discount rates exclusively for this Indiegogo campaign! These perks include in-house options for local folks, such as a month of unlimited kava & tea, food and drink cards, workshop hosting, and private catered parties. The perks also include our amazing retail line that can be shipped to anywhere in the US for folks who aren't Bay Area based but still want to support The Well. This retail line includes organic Chinese teas, herbal teas, golden milk, and drinking chocolate blends.  And the best part - you can gift all of these perks to loved ones! 

 

OUR RETAIL LINE & MENU

 

Drinking Chocolate Blends

If you are ordering a perk with drinking chocolate blends, we will email you asking you to choose your flavors. We have four different drinking chocolate blends: 

ROOTED - chicory, dandelion root, chaga, reishi, ashwagandha, maca, carob

HEART - hawthorne berries, rose petals, rose hips, orange peel

SPICE QUEENDOM - cayenne, clove, cardamom, nutmeg, cinnamon, peppercorn

FIVE FLOWERS - lavender, chamomile, passionflower, calendula, hibiscus

Herbal Tea Blends

If you are ordering a perk with herbal tea blends, we will email you asking you to choose your flavors. We have ten different herbal tea blends:

Clari-Tea: Bring more brain power and mental focus. Gotu kola, gingko, peppermint, ginger, rosemary

Enchanting Kids Tea (good for adults too):  Simple, mellow, magical yum. Lemon verbena, elderberry, hawthorne berry, goji berry, licorice root

Heal your Gut Tea: Nourish, soothe and support digestion. Calendula, Skullcap, burdock, peppermint, meadowsweet, marshmellow, chamomile, licorice, elderberry, plantain

Immuni-Tea: Support your body’s ability to stay healthy. Nettle, tulsi, alfalfa, peppermint, lavender, milky oat tops, ginger

Love Tea: Melt into a luscious expansion of your heart and body. Rose petals, orange peel, damiana, cacao nibs, cinnamon, vanilla bean

Moontime Tea: Relaxing, calming, and caretaking. Peppermint, damiana, skullcap, red raspberry, marshmallow, ginger

Materni- Tea: Nourishing, tonifying, blood-building. Red raspberry leaf, alfalfa, nettles, dandelion leaf, alfalfa, rosehips, peppermint

Herbal Chai Tea: For that rainy day comfort. Cinnamon, cardamom, clove, cayenne, nutmeg, peppercorn

Herbal Coffee: For a caffeine-free, energy-full morning. Chicory, dandelion root, chaga, reishi, ashwagandha, carob, maca

Five Flower Relax Tea: For a deep relaxation. Lavender, chamomile, passionflower, calendula, hibiscus

Golden Milk

If you are ordering a perk with golden milk, you will receive our housemade golden milk blend. This blend is made up of turmeric, ashwagandha, cardamom, ginger, cinnamon, and peppercorn. We recommend that you add 1 teaspoon of our golden milk powder to 8oz of warm milk for a delicious golden milk that you can enjoy from home.

story:
What we do

My name is Anton Kilin and I live in Hamburg. 

In 2020 I decided to start my own small business and chose a direction that, maybe, was not quite unique, at least at first sight. I started doing what I like and what can do, this was cooking. Right now, my small business turned into a brand “Pfunt” and offers a line of deep-frozen products to the customers. These are pelmeni, vareniki, khinkali and sirniki. I am also producing vegetarian variations of these dishes: tofu cheese, cherries, beetroot. 

By now production of deep-frozen products has turned into a continuously developing business. This business started out as an experiment of how the traditional recipes can be adapted to the tastes of consumers and ingredients available and has led me to bigger and ambitious ideas.

Now my goal is to scale up my craft and turn it into a social enterprise.  At present I am producing 12 final products, on average that is 250 kilograms per month. And my goal is to widen the menu of products and start delivery to the neighboring towns. This is a short-term goal that is to be completed by the end of the year 2021. And in terms of long-term aspirations, I dream to create an online training platform for small and mid-size businesses and people who have their ideas and want to start their business in the sector of food production. All the training materials shall be supported with cases from my own business and partnering crafts. The big idea is to develop a network of food producers that will be able to share their experience through the platform, receive the necessary support, and coach. Most importantly, the platform will make it possible to develop a production chain where small producers shall be able to preserve original receipts with high-quality ingredients through cooperation.

What We Need & What You Get

At this point, I would need your help. To make sure my business runs smoothly and maintains continuous delivery I need to purchase additional equipment and services:

- shock-freezing camera (1200 €)

- freezers and showcases (2200 €)

- dough-maker (1400 €)

- dough-processing equipment and dough-knives (200 €)

- funds for inventory (4000 €)

- training for 2 employees (700 €)

- creation of introductory video course (2000 €)

In total, I would need 11700 €.

Is it a big sum of money? – It is, it indeed is big in terms of the development and impact.

When the production line turns into a continuous process, I will start the implementation of the online platform and fill it with real cases and useful information for start-uppers.

If I do not reach the entire goal, I will proceed with the scaling-up process even though it might take a bit longer. Your contributions will be precious in any amount since at the very least I will be able to purchase the essential equipment and further proceed with the training component.

What you get

1. Please donate up to 100 € and you will get

     - free access to our online course "Family home-made food as a business" plus recipe of pelmeni with salmon. This is very delicious and a joy to the whole family.

2. Please donate from 100 € up to 300 € and you will get

   - free access to our online course "Family home-made food as a business" plus recipe of pelmeni with salmon and 

   - a set of our unique seasonings Bergsalz for meat, fish, and chicken 

3. Please donate from 500 € and you will get

   - free access to our online course "Family home-made food as a business" plus recipe of pelmeni with salmon

   - a set of our unique seasonings Bergsalz for meat, fish, and chicken 

   - a set of branded kitchen clothes: t-shirt, cap, and an apron

4. Please donate from 1000 € and you will get

    - free access to our online course "Family home-made food as a business" plus recipe of pelmeni with salmon

   - a set of our unique seasonings Bergsalz for meat, fish, and chicken 

   - a set of branded kitchen clothes: t-shirt, cap, and an apron

   - your name and the name of your company shall be acknowledged through all our sources and on our branding. 

The Impact

Now we are living at times when most of the food production is automated and is focused on monetization. This process is inevitable to some extent; however, I am convinced that there should be space for sustainable food production. I want to scale up my production through the development of networking between suppliers and producers of eco food with the use of an environmentally friendly approach and high-quality ingredients.

Risks & Challenges

As I see from my experience there are two key challenges I may face:

  • Competition with automated production and
  • Market of lower-quality and cheaper products

To mitigate these risks, I will adjust to the following principles:

  • People will be employed and trained specifically for craft production. Employment will be carried out on the principles of equality so that to give job placements to people who feel inspired by the “Pfunt” products
  • High-quality ingredients will be stocked from small producers to ensure no chemicals are used
  • Final products shall have clear and understandable ingredients and a relatively small period of storage. Every final product of “Pfunt” contains not more than 5 ingredients.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would be immensely grateful if you could share your campaign in any convenient way: word of mouth, social networks. This will be of great support for my small business. Also, please use Indiegogo share tools to share my ideas with your friends. You can also subscribe to my page on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/pelmeni_hamburg/ and share it further.

story:
Fireside Brew is a new online coffee brand, rooted in passion for nature.

  • I'm Rich, the founder of Fireside Brew and a life-long enthusiast for the natural world...and coffee. 
  • Fireside Brew brings together 20 years of experience in wilderness bushcraft alongside publishing and audience engagement through my existing business, Whisper Media.
  • Fireside Brew is about connecting people with nature, sharing our passion for the Great Outdoors and building a sustainable business with strong ethics and environmental credentials at its heart. It's also about beautiful coffee.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We're looking for investment to buy stock and launch Fireside Brew in July, just as we expect the world to be recovering from Covid-19 and people to be craving more time outside, with those they care about.
  • Our funding thresholds are £1,500 as a minimum to launch, and £3,000 as an ideal target allowing us to offer a wider range of coffees and equipment.
  • We'll be offering perks including branded merchandise and discount codes for our backers. 

 

The Impact

We have 100% sustainability goals, including:

  • A Tree For 3: we'll plant a UK native tree by donating to causes like The Tree Council and 9Trees.org, for every three items bought in our online shop.
  • Offset Earth: we'll be offsetting all staff and travel costs to make Fireside Brew completely carbon neutral.
  • True Bio Bags; we'll be using fully biodegradable coffee bags to EU EN13432 standards.

 

Risks & Challenges

We live in uncertain times! But we're confident that the post-coronavirus world will see a greater interest in spending time with loved ones, camping, hiking and enjoying the natural world.

Our main challenge will be cutting through the noise and differentiating. To do that we'll be:

  • Building on our existing audience and thousands of connections who share our passion for sustainability and startup business! Fireside Brew is supported by an existing community from our unique event, Fireside Summit, and sustainability magazine, FiresideX. We know we have the reach, we just need the funding to get started.
  • Absorbing all the overheads, salaries and running costs for Fireside Brew into our existing business to make Fireside Brew as lean and focused on customers as possible.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, there are other ways you can support us such as making some noise and share links to our campaign on social media.

We're a small UK business and hugely apprecate your support!
story_txt:
Fireside Brew is a new online coffee brand, rooted in passion for nature.

I'm Rich, the founder of Fireside Brew and a life-long enthusiast for the natural world...and coffee. 
Fireside Brew brings together 20 years of experience in wilderness bushcraft alongside publishing and audience engagement through my existing business, Whisper Media.
Fireside Brew is about connecting people with nature, sharing our passion for the Great Outdoors and building a sustainable business with strong ethics and environmental credentials at its heart. It's also about beautiful coffee.


 
What We Need & What You Get

We're looking for investment to buy stock and launch Fireside Brew in July, just as we expect the world to be recovering from Covid-19 and people to be craving more time outside, with those they care about.

Our funding thresholds are £1,500 as a minimum to launch, and £3,000 as an ideal target allowing us to offer a wider range of coffees and equipment.

True Bio Bags; we'll be using fully biodegradable coffee bags to EU EN13432 standards.


 
Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge will be cutting through the noise and differentiating. To do that we'll be:

Building on our existing audience and thousands of connections who share our passion for sustainability and startup business! Fireside Brew is supported by an existing community from our unique event, Fireside Summit, and sustainability magazine, FiresideX. Absorbing all the overheads, salaries and running costs for Fireside Brew into our existing business to make Fireside Brew as lean and focused on customers as possible.
